com.github.triceo.robozonky

Class ApiProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.robozonky.ApiProvider

  • public class ApiProvider
extends Object
    Provides instances of Zonky and Zotify API for the rest of RoboZonky to use. When no longer needed, the ApiProvider needs to be destroy()ed in order to not leak WebServiceClients.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApiProvider()
      Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a fresh instance of ResteasyClientBuilder.
      ApiProvider(org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ResteasyClientBuilder clientBuilder)
      Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a given instance of ResteasyClientBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InvestingZonkyApi authenticated(CommonFilter filter)
      Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication.
      ZonkyApi authenticatedNonInvesting(CommonFilter filter)
      Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication but does not support investment operations.
      ZotifyApi cache()
      Retrieve Zotify's marketplace cache.
      void destroy() 
      ZonkyOAuthApi oauth(CommonFilter filter)
      Retrieve Zonky's OAuth endpoint.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApiProvider

        public ApiProvider(org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ResteasyClientBuilder clientBuilder)
        Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a given instance of ResteasyClientBuilder. It is the responsibility of the caller to make sure that the builder and all clients are thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        clientBuilder - Client builder to use to instantiate all the APIs.

      • ApiProvider

        public ApiProvider()
        Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a fresh instance of ResteasyClientBuilder. This client will be thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • cache

        public ZotifyApi cache()
        Retrieve Zotify's marketplace cache.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If destroy() already called.

      • oauth

        public ZonkyOAuthApi oauth(CommonFilter filter)
        Retrieve Zonky's OAuth endpoint.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter that will decorate the requests with OAuth headers.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If destroy() already called.

      • authenticatedNonInvesting

        public ZonkyApi authenticatedNonInvesting(CommonFilter filter)
        Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication but does not support investment operations. This is useful in dry mode.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter that will decorate the requests with OAuth headers.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If destroy() already called.

      • authenticated

        public InvestingZonkyApi authenticated(CommonFilter filter)
        Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter that will decorate the requests with OAuth headers.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If destroy() already called.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
